1.「ああ よかった！ キッズは すっかり| <pc>さんに なついたようですね！|: Oh, thank goodness! The Kids seem to have|taken to <pc> pretty well! I knew you|could do it.

13.「あわわわ……。| こっちに来ますよ チャーノさん！: Awww... they're coming this way, Mr. Ciano!

It's a shame that people don't know about such|a wonderful profession. At the very least, I|will spread the word to my merchant|
|companions.
